LanguageData.MedPod_Stat_PowerConsumptionDiagnosis_De: The amount of power this MedPod will draw from the power grid while operating in Diagnosis mode.
LanguageData.MedPod_Stat_PowerConsumptionHealing_Desc: The amount of power this MedPod will draw from the power grid while operating in Treatment mode.
LanguageData.MedPod_Stat_DiagnosisTime_Desc: How long it takes for this MedPod to diagnose a patient.
LanguageData.MedPod_Stat_PerHediffHealingTime_Desc: How long it takes (on average) for this MedPod to treat each medical condition on a patient.\n\nNote that this is scaled according to the severity of the condition - for instance, less severe injuries will take less time to treat.
